title: (39300) Torrelavega - 4 Calle José Posada Herrera
description: Launderette self-service. Parking a little further at the Centro commercial. Opening hours 9am-10pm. . 12 and 15 kg. dryer available.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 7 Calle Maestro Mediavilla
description: Lava Piu, self-service laundry

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 10 Calle Cid
description: Located right next to the covered children's playground. Two taps, no possibility to connect a hose. Parking around.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 93 Calle José María Pereda
description: Free parking downtown and front supermarket.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 11B Calle Carlos Pondal
description: Very quiet paved road for the night next to the family houses. A few steps from the city center on foot. laundry nearby.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 8A Calle Pintor Varela
description: Free parking day and night. It is in the city center and there is a lot of traffic that comes and goes at least during the week, but it is an option if you need to sleep in the center or park during the day.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 41 Paseo Niño
description: Parking 5 minutes from the center. shops

title: (39300) Torrelavega -
description: Free motorhome area located in the heart of the city of Torrelavega. It has 10 seats and basic services. It has electricity and extra wifi. Important: Only from Thursday to Monday.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 82 Calle Emilio Revuelta
description: There are only 4 delimited places but they are for campers because a large motorhome does not fit. The views without really beautiful. A very nice place.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 120 Paseo de Julio Hauzeur
description: Shaded parking next to the river and a park and a skateboarding area.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 78 Calle Caserios
description: Quiet parking both day and night. We have had a good night here. It is next to a playground and a small indoor soccer field. The best thing is that it has garbage, source of drinking water, barbecue and tables with chairs :)

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 5 Plaza de las Autonomías
description: 21st Century Laundry

title: (39300) Torres - 21 Barrio el Milagro
description: Recreational area in the natural park of Las Cuencas. Tables, shade and a good place to eat and rest by the river.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 2 Calle Río Miera
description: Parking recently created by the city of torrelavega. No services. Far from the city center (20 minutes on foot). Torrelavega is a very festive town and it can get very crowded. This car park is a good fallback solution if the others are full. Calm. You can go there with a large motorhome. Indeed, it is possible to overflow on a grass part.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 102 Barrio Ganzo
description: It is a parking lot of a small shopping center that is very quiet and spacious. In the back there is no one and it overlooks an open space where it is very good. Perfect for stopping to stock up on EVERYTHING you may need. Ideal if you are on your way to other beaches. It is not to take the instagram photo but there is nature if you know how to see it.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 107 Avenida de Bilbao
description: MacDonalds car park, the person in charge of the car park told us that we could spend the night without problem.

title: (39300) Barreda - 373 Avenida Solvay
description: Self-service laundry with 12 and 15 kilo machines and 16 kilo dryers. Change machine for 5 and 10 euro bills. And with ample parking

title: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 39 Barrio Puente San Miguel
title_short: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 39 Barrio Puente San Miguel
description: Gravel public parking, fairly level

title: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 130A Barrio Puente San Miguel
title_short: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 130A Barrio Puente San Miguel
description: Small car park below a railway line but a lot of shade, games for children, water points, nice cafe nearby. Perfect for picnic or break.

title: (39313) Polanco - 1616 Barrio Rinconeda
description: Large new paved car park next to the stadium, with streetlights but very quiet.

title: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 183 Barrio Puente San Miguel
title_short: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 183 Barrio Puente San Miguel
description: Self-service laundry, it has two washing machines of 12 and 15 kg and two dryers. It has a change machine, a table to fold clothes with "walls" for privacy and a television. Washing takes about 30 minutes and drying about 20.

title: (39311) Cartes - 74A Calle Camino Real
description: Parking day and night in the center of Cartes, a charming town. It is next to a large park with tables and children's games, also a sports area with paddle tennis, soccer and basketball courts. It also contains a green path that goes from Corrales de Buelna to Suances, ideal for cycling through all the towns in the area.

title: (39313) Rinconeda - 15M Barrio Rinconeda
description: Small but uncrowded dirt car park, with a large children's playground right in front, a couple of wooden tables and a public toilet. Very clean and quiet. Perfect for a stopover. There is no prohibition sign but we don't know if you can stay overnight without problem.

title: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 1 Barrio la Veguilla
title_short: (39530) Puente San Miguel - 1 Barrio la Veguilla
description: 200 meters from the motorway, in a small town (Puente San Miguel) with all services (shops, bakery, bars, restaurants, taxi, train, health centre and laundrette). Toilets in FEVE station. Quiet place next to the river with a pretty river path. New dedicated dog area adjacent. Easy FEVE train links to Torrelavega and Santander. Close to Santillana del Mar.

title: (39313) Polanco - 20 Barrio Rinconeda
description: Laundry with easy parking and washing machines for pets, as well as a dryer for pets. No need to bring your soap.

title: (39538) Reocín - 234 Barrio Helguera
description: Free WiFi and shower

title: (39350) Suances - Barrio Hinojedo-Muelle
description: Small van place. You can ride a small 2x4 along a track a few meters to the Besaya greenway car park. Quiet, flat place without services. I recommend riding the bike to Suances by the estuary (7km)

title: (39311) Cartes - 78A Calle Camino Real
description: Safe and quiet free parking. Ideal for parking with a motorhome, camper, etc. Next to a soccer field and a skatepark.

title: (39538) La Veguilla -
description: An ideal place to do your laundry and wait in the cafe. food and drink good and very reasonably priced.

name: Altamira Camping Park
title: (39314) Altamira Camping Park
description: Santillana del Mar, 20 CA-131. Altamira Camping Park

title: (39314) Santillana del Mar - 2A Barrio Viveda
description: Park with tables and barbecues, ideal for a stopover. There are two water fountains, press for water, not possible to screw a hose. The first parking lot is accessible for all vehicles, the picknick area with the fontains only for smaller ones.

title: (39312) Polanco - 7J Barrio Requejada
description: Full laundry with washing and drying machines of three different sizes and large capacity as well as washer and dryer for pet clothes. Very clean and with a parking lot next to it where you can leave the motorhome while you are doing laundry, next to a small shady garden where you can be with your dog. Very close to the highway. Comfort and cleanliness.

title: (39539) Villapresente - 9A Lugar Barrio Villapresente
description: It is completely flat, calm and easy to reach. 900m from the labyrinth. Very very quiet location

title: (39312) - 1A Carretera Polanco
description:
Parking public du cimetière municipal, quartier très calme.
Couchers de soleil spectaculaires en hiver et vue sur Los Picos de Europa chaque jour clair.
Au centre du village il y a une petite épicerie, une autre avec des bonbons, un tabac avec des journaux, une banque Santander avec un distributeur automatique de billets et un musée dédié au patrimoine historique scolaire 
Localisation GPS des magasins: 43.385885, -4.016410

title: (39479) - 29A Barrio Valencia
description: Level esplanade with grass floor, several barbecues and a picnic table. Although there are surveillance cameras, there is no sign forbidden to stay overnight. We slept one day, the beautiful views.

title: (39539) - 150B Lugar Barrio Villapresente
description: Villapresente labyrinth parking. It has 5 specific places for motorhomes in the car park

title: (39539) Reocin - 110A Lugar Barrio Villapresente
description: Quiet parking, away from town. Sometimes the train passes but it doesn't bother. There is a basketball/majomano field next door and a playground. Not very crowded, there are a couple of trees where you can park in the shade. Very flat.

title: (39679) Puente Viesgo - 78 Diseminado Presillas
description: Ample parking next to the Church of San Nicolás. Picnic table and chairs. Very calm.

title: (39330) Santillana del Mar - Calle Castillo
description: Parking in Santillana. you can spend the night. Free, without service. Perfect parking area in beautiful peaceful surroundings. Short walk into the gorgeous town and lovely walk to the viewpoint you can see from the aire.

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - 2011A Avenida del Alcalde Antonio Sandi
title_short: (39360) Santillana del Mar - 2011A Avenida del Alcalde Antonio Sandi
description: Recess at the entrance to Santillana. Extremely dirty (!!!) and very busy road. But allowed, free (miracle) and 10 minutes walk from the old center.  Maximum 2 or 3 motorhomes, but in the middle of the day you will have to be lucky because cars are also parked there. Perfect if you arrive before 10am.

title: (39330) Santillana del Mar - Avenida Antonio Sandi, 11
title_short: (39330) Santillana del Mar - Avenida Antonio Sandi, 11
description: Excellent town centre car park with lots of shade under the trees. They have a water tap in the back left corner, open the valve on the floor below the tap!  Rubbish bins next door, supermarket, laundry and restaurants 50m away.  lovely people running the car park.  No grey or black disposal.

title: (39360) - 3A Barrio Santill
description: Off road, free, nice view, quiet

name: CAMPER PARK SANTILLANA DEL MAR
title: (39330) CAMPER PARK SANTILLANA DEL MAR
description:
Large area 2 minutes walk from the Collegiate Church with electricity service, water loading and unloading, possibility of reserving a space through its AreasPLA Booking App, a quiet and flat area with large spaces. The best entrance is the one through the soccer field, the other option given by the GPS is narrow.
You need to register first if you arrive without pre booking.

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - 5 Plaza Rey
description: Laundry service with washing and drying. Laundry collection service and ironing service.

title: (39360) Ongayo - 45 Carretera Ongayo
description:
Green recreation area with swings, tables, some shades and cool views of the countryside.
The location is good, the traffic on the road is moderate. Space for 3-4 vans, but max. Length 6m. There is also a playground and a water point with clean drinking water.

title: (39330) Santillana del Mar - 15A Calle Jesús Otero
title_short: (39330) Santillana del Mar - 15A Calle Jesús Otero
description: Public parking in the center of the town of Santillana del Mar with 4 places for motorhomes at the back of the car park. It is forbidden to camp but not to sleep in a motorhome. At night it is very quiet, but for the day in summer there are many cars parked. Next to the information and tourism center where there is a toilet

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - 1 Plaza Rey
description: Campers have to buy a bus ticket (Not mentioned anywhere!). If you buy the normal ticket you will get a fee

title: (39330) Santillana del Mar -
description: Self-service drinking water tap.

title: (39330) Santillana del Mar - 1003 Calle Río
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (39679) - 115 Diseminado Vargas
description: Small shady place, directly on the river with access.

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - CA-134
description: Altamira Cave/ Museum Parking

name: Camping Santillana del Mar
title: (39330) Camping Santillana del Mar
description: Campsite Santillana del Mar. Large campsite at the entrance to the town, trees, somewhat rustic electrical installation but everything works, it has the advantage of being open in December which is rare on the coast.

title: (39360) Suances - 45B Barrio Ongayo
description: Behind a charming little church and along the little cemetery, several tables in a small field. A water tap alongside the church.

title: (39470) - 6B Barrio Sorribero Bajo
description: Quiet and beautiful place, perfect for dogs, next to a river with very nice places to rest, good parking without height limit, clean perfect for dogs, nature

title: (39318) Miengo - 2034 Diseminado Cudon
description: Small, super nice and isolated spot at the end of a country road below (we are rather hidden from the road). It is an old wash house and the water tap is still working, fresh but good! We did not sleep at night but the area seems to lend itself to it (only for small vehicles, we are in T4 transporter)

title: (39509) Mazcuerras - 52 Diseminado San Miguel
description: Parking next to the road without services for cars, motorhomes and vans.

title: (39360) Ongayo - 12 Carretera la Tejera
description: Fountain and small park

title: (39340) Suances - Vias Verdes de Besaya
description: Small car park next to the estuary and greenway for bikes and pedestrians.  not highly recommended for motorhomes for a couple of points on the road that has a steep incline and narrowing. It has practically no views of the estuary due to the height of the trees that delimit the parking lot. drinking water at about 50 meters

title: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 2 Barrio Sorribero Bajo
title_short: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 2 Barrio Sorribero Bajo
description: There is a lot of free space during the holiday season. You eat very well in the restaurant that is right next to the level crossing, "El Jardín de Victoria".

title: (39679) Vargas - 1094 Barrio Vargas
description: Self-service laundry. Modern machines, clothes come out clean and smell good. Are there any alternatives. Easy parking at the Dia supermarket opposite.

title: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 24 Carretera de la Mies
title_short: (39470) Renedo de Piélagos - 24 Carretera de la Mies
description: Public parking

title: (39539) Cantabria - 1 Barrio San Pedro
description: Barbecues very quiet tables next to the river saja very small town there are two restaurants there is good food. Flood zone.

title: (39679) Vargas - 1061 Barrio Vargas
description: Parking in Vargas for cars, you can park and spend the night without problems.

title: (39539) San Pedro - 3 Barrio San Pedro
description: Small picnic area next to a hermitage between a train station and the river. We do not spend the night but it looks very quiet and we do not think there are problems. There is a small soccer field. The water source works without problems. Very quiet, from time to time the train passes but they are major annoyances. AC difficult to access, we came with three vans and no problem.

title: (39525) Oreña - 218 Barrio Viallan
description: Green space with swings, small slide and picnic table with benches. Not bad for eating.

title: (39310) Gornazo - A-67 Salida 191,000 (Margen Derecho)
description: Private motorhome area with many services.

title: (39318) Gornazo - 13P Calle la Castañera
description: Clean, hot showers, friendly staff.. cafe food available

title: (39539) San Pedro - 39B Lugar Barrio San Pedro
title_short: (39539) San Pedro - 39B Lugar Barrio San Pedro
description: Parking of a little train station. We had a very quiet night there as we couldn’t find a place we felt good at before sunset. Sure there is the train passing until midnight but then it was perfectly quiet till morning.

title: (39340) Suances - 3 Barrio la Rasa
description: Public car parks almost on the outskirts of Suances, the only free place where you can park, although the signs indicate c / Quitana 110, now the street is called Marqués de Santillana. Half an hour from Suances on foot.

title: (39525) Oreña - 190 Barrio Viallan
description: Drinking water source

title: (39340) Suances - 15 Plaza Viares
description: It is a laundry located next to the Delgado hardware store. It is advisable to go on foot leaving the motorhome parked somewhere nearby

title: (39408) Coo - 553 Barrio Barros
description: Small siding on the road, with shade and fountain to stop to rest or eat inside the van. Cool place at noon.

title: (39340) Suances - 6 Plaza Viares
description:
Small cars only!
A little inclined. Access to the beach for a walk although there is a certain drop to 15 '

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 1015 Lugar Barrio Puente Viesgo
title_short: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 1015 Lugar Barrio Puente Viesgo
description: Parking right next to a small bridge, has about 8 seats, quite flat. Some cyclists spend most of the day, but we spend a quiet night there, always respecting the rules.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 36A Barrio Puente Viesgo
description: Parking near the village with several bars and several bakery services, coviran retail stores etc.

title: (39340) Suances - 6 Calle Atajo
description: Suances does not want motorhomes, you cannot park in the entire municipality and they only leave this paid parking lot without any service

title: (39340) Suances - 2 Calle Atajo
description: Parking with overnight

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - 91 Barrio Ubiarco
description: Parking at Santa Justa beach. the small cove of Santa Justa (500m) is within walking distance. Small restaurant, WC (accessible if consumption at the bar) and shower (cold) free. We spent the night without problem. A few come and go but nothing disturbing.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 13 Diseminado Puente Viesgo
description: A smaller parking lot to the municipal picnic area (picnic benches with grill) with a small ailing playground. It's a little bit green and you can hear the rushing of the river, so that the cars on the street don't stand out as much.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - CA-703
description: Parking of the caves of puente viesgo. Some unevenness but super quiet with beautiful views of the town. Ideal for overnight stay to see the caves.

title: (39340) Suances - 1 Calle Isaac Peral
description: Picnic with four tables and a water fountain. It also has a lot of space to park, we have not stayed, but it seems quiet.

title: (39360) Tagle - 37 Calle San Pedro
description: Parking Near the Beach, with a picknick and barbecue area, below is the beach where there is a beach bar with a bathroom and showers.

name: Camping Suances
title: (39340) Camping Suances
description: Nice camping right in the center of Suances. Very friendly staff and cute bar to get breakfast.

title: (39360) Suances - 1 Diseminado Tagle
description: Parking. Out of season without problem.

title: (39340) Suances - 26 Calle Madrid
description: It's not a parking space as such, it's only a few parking spots off the street, but the view is very good.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 1092 Barrio Puente Viesgo
description: Quiet and illuminated parking. Something less noisy than the center of Puente Viesgo. 3 min from the Spa.

title: (39360) Santillana del Mar - Unnamed Road
description: On a small flat grass promontory. Exceptional viewpoint over the Cantabria coast. Path for walking or cycling. possible for van. Rather wide and stony path. Magical place for 2 camper vans thirsting for tranquility

title: (39660) Socobio - 35 Calle Socobio
description: Place which has no other interest than being in the shade because under the highway bridge.

title: (39340) Suances - n10 Paseo de la Marina Española
title_short: (39340) Suances - n10 Paseo de la Marina Española
description: We have been to La Concha beach surfing and we have parked two vans at this location. After the bath we went to have a drink at a bar that was less than 5 minutes away. When we returned we found the 2 vehicles with the 2 sides scratched with keys.

address.street: n10 Paseo de la Marina Española

title: (39340) Suances - 8a Paseo de la Marina Española
title_short: (39340) Suances - 8a Paseo de la Marina Española
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (39470) - 4D Barrio Renedo
description: Water source.

title: (39525) Cantabria - 291 Barrio Oreña
description: Parking of a beautiful little church, on the way to Saint Jacques de Compostela. Magnificent view, sunset. Convenient and quiet for one night

title: (39660) Castañeda - Socobio
description: Parking to visit the collegiate church of Santa Cruz de Castañeda. Quiet place, although you can hear the highway. Nearby there is a park for children. We liked it very much.

title: (39318) - 783 Calle Playa Marzan
description: Parking of the mirador. No service, flat parking. Overlooking the old quarry with views of the estuary and the ocean. 4 to 5 places available after a track on 1 km to reach it, passable for all. Very little passage, super calm. Small flat, some mosquitoes at sunset. Other flat corners on the grass to get away if want.

title: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 0 Calle San Fernando
title_short: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 0 Calle San Fernando
description: Parking of the town's sports center, located on the outskirts. There is a picnic area with shades. Although there were some young people at the picnic area, they left early and we parked far away. Very quiet night.

title: (39525) Oreña - 9 Barrio San Roque
description: A drinking water fountain in a picnic area

title: (39525) Cantabria - 176B Diseminado Oreña
description: Magnificent parking lot with a beautiful view of the bay and many climbing routes. (The topos are available on other websites). Road bumpy.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 45 Diseminado Puente Viesgo
description:
Tarmac parking area. Level. By the river, with crossing point to other bank to walk to the prehistoric caves (if the river is low). Quiet, locals walking dogs in the morning but not unhappy with us being parked. Good quality long distance cycle path next to parking spot so plenty of runners, walkers and cyclists. 

Sign in Spanish saying "please take your rubbish away", but nothing prohibiting camping.

Access: only the most northerly of the two roads named Bo. Corrobarceno on Google maps is actually accessible - OK in a 6m peugeot boxer panel van conversion, there is a narrow section with two protruding boulders about 20m off the main road which might be a bit narrow in a coach built motorhome (we probably had 20-30cm on each side in a Boxer panel van). The other two apparent roads on Google maps are blocked.

title: (39318) Miengo - 1015 Barrio Cuchia
description: Spectacular place to rest

title: (39318) -
description: Provisional motorhome parking, no services, only parking.

title: (39360) Tagle - Unnamed Road
description: Small track located at the top of a cliff, accessible by classic vehicle. Superb view over 189 degrees. In the middle of the fields.

title: (39318) Miengo - 26 Barrio la Playa
description: Very spacious and quiet parking. With large green areas and children's play area with swings and zip line. Bike lane and sidewalks to walk to the town of Cuchia and to the beach of Marzán. Very quiet beach and suitable for families with children. With services such as showers, a lifeguard post in the summer season and a Cuchia beach bar. Views of Suances.

title: (39318) Cantabria - 9 Calle La Fuente
description: Small fountain to collect drinking water

name: Camping Restaurante Hermanos García Cuchia
title: (39318) Camping Restaurante Hermanos García Cuchia
description: Camping site, presumably only open in summer.

title: (39408) Los Corrales de Buelna - 162 Barrio Coo
title_short: (39408) Los Corrales de Buelna - 162 Barrio Coo
description:
Next to the river. Games area and 4 barbecues with more than six tables next to the church. Nice and quiet town to take a walk with several restaurants. Less than ten minutes from the a67.
It is a narrow and low street, it is not recommended for large motorhomes.

title: (39670) Puente Viesgo - 22A Barrio Corrobarceno
description: Ample parking, with garbage cans.

title: (39318) Miengo - 3B Plaza Residencial Cuchía
description: Very quiet flat parking with a beautiful view of the beaches. Possibility to spend the night. Local restaurant by small path at 50 m. Easy truck access.

title: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 7 Calle Trabajadores de Authi
title_short: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 7 Calle Trabajadores de Authi
description: Free parking in the center of Corrales de Buelna. Parking is prohibited on Wednesdays between 8am and 4pm due to the local market.

title: (39477) Oruña de Piélagos - 13 Barrio el Puente
title_short: (39477) Oruña de Piélagos - 13 Barrio el Puente
description: Very good spot understand the trees. We stopped there in a very hot day and it really helped us! Drinking water and tables, close to the river.

title: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 17 Avenida Primero de Mayo
title_short: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 17 Avenida Primero de Mayo
description: It is a new outdoor parking for vehicles. Secluded and quiet place with buildings nearby, with a playground next to it and a meadow. There is no possibility of removing gray water or refilling drinking water, but there are 3 gas stations in the town.

title: (39318) Cuchia - 6 Barrio la Iglesia
description: Free drinking water. Station with threads to screw in a pipe

title: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 20 Calle Dos de Mayo
title_short: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - 20 Calle Dos de Mayo
description: Self-service laundry

title: (39660) Socobio - 176A Diseminado Pomaluengo
description: CEPSA gas station, with showers included to give you a rinse, opened a month ago.

title: (39525) - 4 Barrio Oreña
description: Parking at the end of the road after the village of Torriente. Quiet, around the fields and 2 houses. We are on the cliff and we overlook the ocean, the landscape is beautiful Picnic tables (x2) and barbecue in hard available. No water. Waste bin available.

title: (39525) Orena - 56 Barrio Caborredondo
description: Parking

title: (39660) Pomaluengo - 117 Calle Pomaluengo
description: Recent area created by the municipality of Castañeda. Attached to the highway but at night it is quite quiet. It has a bike lane that takes you to the tourist town of Puente Viesgo and 1km in the other direction is the playground with a climbing wall and pump track. You have a loading and unloading service, ideal for making a stop along the way.

title: (39318) Miengo - 41 Calle el Riberuco
description: Nice view from a cliff

title: (39409) - 567 Lugar Barrio Jain
description: Small but suitable for motorhomes. A little uneven. Poor internet coverage however the environment is very beautiful.

title: (39478) - Barrio Solarana
description: Very quiet place next to the river, the only noise besides birds and some pedestrians is that of the A67 in the distance. Recommended to spend one night. There are no services, arc bridge is a 20min walk, a very lonely walk. You park on the side of a little or very little frequented road.

title: (39591) Periedo - 7 Barrio Periedo
description: Place close to Cabezón de la Sal, amazing views of the Saja river. Stone barbecue (missing the grill), playground for kids and water available. 2 to 3 parking spots in a very quiet and peaceful place. We did not spend the night there but it could be a possibility.

title: (39660) - 83 Calle Pomaluengo
description: On the banks of the Pisueña River in Paluengo. (Cantabria). Quiet place with several sources of drinking water.

title: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - Autovía Cantabria - Meseta
title_short: (39400) Los Corrales de Buelna - Autovía Cantabria - Meseta
description: We spent two nights there, the highway is close but the truth is that nothing bothered us, we woke up both days at about 10 in the morning and only the first day two vehicles passed by, one for work and the other was a kid learning to drive. . That's if it's full of shit from the pigs that are going to do it there... It's a bit of a riding school but I already said that being parties as they were nobody showed up there!!

name: SERVICE AREA THE BROOM
title: (39300) SERVICE AREA THE BROOM
description: At the gas station, toilets and a shower, with no time limit. Very friendly staff. Good coin-operated car wash for campers of all sizes. Shop and cafe.

title: (39400) Somahoz - 173 Lugar Barrio San Andres
description: Level parking next to the river, with green area and at the end of the Ruta de las Tejadas. Narrow bridge but plenty for AC.

title: (39660) La Cueva - 3A Diseminado la Cueva
description: Small square to spend a quiet night. there is a fount. It is the village cemetery, few quieter places will be

title: (39691) Iruz - 85A Barrio Iruz
description: Parking area next to doctor's surgery, right next to Via Verde del Pas cycle path. Good butcher and pharmacy opposite.

title: (39329) Cantabria - Unnamed Road
description: On the edge of a small road with almost no traffic (agricultural) small place to park. Or on a small path (agricultural) that goes to the cliffs. We are staying 2h for a breakfast, splendid view not of house around only cows and the ocean. For the night maybe possible. No service. Possible passage of the farmer.

title: (39478) Boo de Piélagos - 50C Barrio las Coces
title_short: (39478) Boo de Piélagos - 50C Barrio las Coces
description: Parking without specific spaces for AC. Next to a playground in a quiet residential area. Bazaar (with food section) and bar 50 m away.

name: Ocio La Flor
title: (39626) Ocio La Flor
description: Parking space on the farm, nice host. toilet available. Great for kids. 2 hectares of corn maze for children and adults. Kiosk, bar, soccer field, archery, visit to the cow farm and the opportunity to bottle feed the calves. You can swim in the nearby river.

title: (39329) Toñanes - 48A Barrio Toñanes
description: Quiet place with shade with grass to make a stop and eat, with fountain, barbecue (remember to read regulations about it), several tables and play area for children. Parking for 3 vehicles.

title: (39691) Santiurde de Toranzo - 15A Barrio Iruz
description: Quiet place to spend the night. pass the greenway near the parking lot

title: (39120) Liencres - CA-305
description:
Large car park on the beach renowned for surfing. A sign says that it is forbidden to spend the night, a lot of cars during the day but calm in the evening.

parked up evening of 21st June, big carpark, plenty of room in the evening, campers in for a few days parked over towards left as you enter. if you're a surfer you'll love it, safe for the average swimmer, if not a surfer or swimmer you still have to love it.

title: (39650) Argomilla - 205 Diseminado Penilla
description: Esplanade next to a church, very quiet and beautiful area. Great for sleeping When we arrived it was full of paper, plastic, cans and rubbish in general, so we collected everything, put it in bags and threw it in the rubbish bin at the exit. Please leave the place clean and decent.

title: (39329) - 1001 Barrio Toñanes
description: Parking at the end of the road that overlooks some spectacular cliffs. Quiet place to spend the night. easy access.

title: (39120) Liencres - CA-305
description: Large asphalt parking lot surrounded by a huge forest. Day  without problems. There are taps with drinking water but no thread. There is a path to walk through the forest. Quiet and beautiful place to rest.

title: (39407) Villayuso - 3B Diseminado Collado
description: Flat esplanade with a viewpoint, some trees that provide shade. Ideal for eating and even sleeping. Out of all population.

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 58 Barrio Cóbreces
description: Drinking water point behind the church, parking nearby

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 180A Lugar Barrio Corrales
description:
Welcome to caravan park s, located in Cóbreces, a humble wonand peaceful village on the western coast of Cantabria (Spain).
Location
Our park is a stone’s throw from the nearest beach, (just 1km away), inbetween the well-known villages of Comillas and Santillana del Mar, and 155 km away from Oviedo, 136 km away from Bilbao and 45 km away from Santander.
In Las Hazas caravan park you can enjoy the natural beauty and relax in eye-catching and green surroundings. We have modern facilities that cater for all your and your family’s needs. Wonderful stay and great owner. First class

title: (39120) Liencres - 479 Barrio Liencres
description: Parking between eucalyptus and pine trees. Pass paved road nearby, but very quiet. Several walking routes depart from the site. nearby beach

title: (39120) - CA-305
description: Parking of the natural park of the Dunas de Liencres. There is a very nice 5 minute walk to the beach through the forest.

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 1098 Barrio Cóbreces
description: Parking with 6 parking spaces, in the village with food stores, cheese factory

title: (39509) Mazcuerras - 36 Barrio Luzmela-Mazcuerras
description: Parking recently built with enough places, somewhat slanted and stuck to the road, but not very busy and looks very quiet, has a parking sign that says motorhomes are allowed, next from a 17th century church, the center of the city walk 3 minutes.

title: (39612) Parbayón - 75a Barrio el Jurrio
description: shaded seating area, fountain and trash can, ideal for eating and lounging

title: (39650) - 162A Diseminado Penilla
description: Large parking lot next to the cemetery. Two very friendly dogs will keep you company. Surrounded by eucalyptus trees.

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 217A Lugar Barrio Luaña
description: Alternative location at the village location without infrastructure but with a more beautiful view.

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 20 Barrio Cóbreces
description: Parking area 300 meters from the beach, parking for 10 vehicles, fairly level, but space is limited, we parked well and our motorhome is 7 meters.

title: (39509) Mazcuerras - Barrio Cos
description: Daily parking inside a beautiful forest next to the Saja River, with a playground, soccer field and picnic tables. There is a source of drinking water. The entrance is narrow passing the small stream of the mill and the laundry. Good place to start hiking trails and start the Foramontanos Route. Flat land and noise section. Very quiet and safe. Last stretch too narrow by motorhome.

title: (39626) Santa María de Cayón - N-634
description: Service area for loading and unloading, next to the highway and next to a gas station. ideal for a stop on the road. Small shop and restaurant

title: (39320) Cóbreces - 5 Barrio Cóbreces
description: Beach parking in front of a hotel. They have toilets and beach showers. Height barrier was open in February

title: (39507) -
description: Space parallel to the highway with ample parking, fountain, play area ... ideal for a break on the road.

title: (39327) Ruilobuca - 225 Barrio Cóbreces

title: (39407) - 126 Barrio la Rueda
description: Square in front of the town hall. Empty square at night. Quiet place. There is a fountain.

title: (39699) Borleña - 216 Lugar Barrio Borleña

Access to the sea possible, rock formation super for fishing crabs.

title: (39120) Cantabria - 17 Barrio la Caseta
description: It is a normal street, quite inclined, but perfect for leaving the motorhome and going to Cerrias beach. Spectacular views, very cool beach but with algae. fine sand and turquoise waters.

title: (39120) Liencres - 1A Barrio la Caseta
description: Day and night parking in front of a garden area with tables and a playground. It is very close to a cliff that is usually full and it is difficult to get space. The area is quiet, not many cars pass by as it is almost the end of a road. It is a good alternative to spend the night in a community that usually prohibits sleeping everywhere.

title: (39690) Liaño - Santa Bárbara 25
description: Great place to spend the night, with all services, small supermarket and cafeteria inside the gas station, nice people, we will definitely return. Fresh water is paid (1 token), when you get gasoline you get 2 tokens. Each token gives you 2.5 minutes of fresh water (which is very short).

title: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 24 Calle Navas
title_short: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 24 Calle Navas

title_short: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 7 Lugar Urbanizacion Domañanes

title: (39620) Sarón - 1021 Barrio Sarón

title: (39120) Somacuevas - 27 Barrio la Caseta

title: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 1 Calle las Casucas
title_short: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 1 Calle las Casucas

title: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 2 Paseo Ambrosio Calzada
title_short: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal - 2 Paseo Ambrosio Calzada
description: Parking 4 minutes from downtown

title: (39500) Cabezón de la Sal -
description: Very good experience in this laundry. The clothes were clean and with a very mild smell. I am sensitive to strong odors and chemicals and I was very pleased. They use active oxygen in addition to detergent. The only drawback is that you can only pay with cash in coins. There is a machine that changes your bills. The dryer is also great, it depends on the amount of clothes with one or two cycles of 15 minutes at medium temperature, the clothes are perfect. We found easy parking next door.

title: (39690) La Concha -
description: Parking next to the wooded park of riosequillo, walnut trees, chestnut trees, pines groves a very very quiet, source, to spend the day and night with family, a few meters from the municipal pools of villaescusa, bike paths. Forbidden to spend the night

title: (39527) La Iglesia - Unnamed Road
description: Parking is located at the top of the small mountain. A steep and stony path leads over narrow curves to the beautiful view. You can hear the cows in the background with their bells and at night you can enjoy a beautiful sunset with the bright city in the background. If you stand correctly, you can balance the inclination well.

title: (39527) Ruilobuca - 27 Diseminado Sierra
description: Asphalt parking in front of the cemetery. Quiet place to spend the night. About 50 seats. It is located about 200 m. the campsite that has a bar, restaurant.

title: (39620) Sarón - CA-142
description: Laundry

title: (39527) La Iglesia -
description: A nice picnic spot, up the hill, the road is paved, sometimes steep and have narrow corners. Not possible with a longer than 5 or 6m camper, and/or a low camper. The view is great, please walk up the Rocky Road to have a nice view, or watch the sun set in the sea.

title: (39698) Santiurde de Toranzo - 3A Barrio Acereda
description: Ample space next to the road with picnic tables and dumpster. Surrounded by trees and nature.

title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 32 Barrio Santa María de Cayón

title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 40A Barrio Sta Maria

name: Camping Arnia
title: (39120) Camping Arnia
description: Camping Arnia with very beautiful views, 5 minutes by car from Liencres and very close to the Dunas de Liencres Natural Park and numerous beaches in the area, they allow pets and everything is well cared for. Prices: 6 euros adult   6 euros car, 9 van and 14 motorhome.

title: (39120) - 21 Barrio la Arnía
description:
Parking recently opened by the town hall.
Vehicles weighing more than 3,500kg and not more than 5.5m in length are not allowed to enter.
It is shared with cars and is dirt on a sloping plot

title: (39627) Cabárceno - Unnamed Road
description: Parking

description:
Historical laundry with a very good and fresh drinking water source, the neighbors say that it gives you luck if you drink! They come to get water from the nearby towns! picnic tables by a stream
The town is very pretty. Narrow streets

title: (39507) - CA-135
description: Parking between trees, near the road. To visit the redwood forest. We had a quiet night

title: (39450) Las Fraguas - 65 Calle Collantes

Quiet place, belongs to
 Parking 1 of the Monument to the Sequoias. It is next to the road and there is some noise, but perfect for leaving the van and visiting the Park.

description: Small fenced plot which in high season you have to pay for a quiet sea view with restaurants next door. Without services but with a spectacular location. Open from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (39507) - CA-135
description: Nice corner for the picnic with tables and barbecue, shaded and with a water point.

title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - Barrio Ruda - Totero

Very quiet, near a river bank. The bridge is pedestrian. Only for Van as the turn from the road is very steep and narrow. You can return at the end only. 
Super calm mais seulement pour Van.
